alert.note: Alert for Northeast Bighorn Mountains; Sheridan Foothills (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 30 at 5:43PM MDT by NWS Billings
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT EASTERN BIG HORN...WESTERN CUSTER...WESTERN POWDER RIVER...ROSEBUD...EASTERN TREASURE AND SHERIDAN COUNTIES THROUGH 645 PM MDT... At 542 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a cluster of strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 9 miles southwest of Hillside to 10 miles north of Granite Pass. Movement was east at 45 mph. There is an outflow producing strong winds ahead of the thunderstorms as well, including all areas south of Colstrip. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Sheridan, Miles City, Colstrip, Forsyth, Ranchester, Dayton, Lodge Grass, Lame Deer, Crow Agency, Ashland, Busby, Big Horn, Rosebud, Birney, Angela, Cartersville, Hathaway, Brandenberg, Kirby, and Rosebud Battlefield Park. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
